string-array.name: hymnWords
string-array.item:
1.
Pakava nokusuwa, nziyo ndokumira,
Apo munhu avamurima rechivi,
(Ndiyani) Pasi totarisa (Mubatsiri)
Makungwa ngirozi,
Ndiyani muponesi angadzikinura munhu.

CHORUS
Gwayana raMwari rinobvisa zvivi,
NdiShe Jesu mubatsiri, mununuri wedu,
Samasimba, munyaradzi,
Makafanira mbiri.
2.
Zano roruponeso nyika isati yasikwa,
Rakaiswa nerudo rwaMwaru rukuru,
(Chitsidzo) Kuponesa nyika,
(Zvisikwa zvese) Chitsidzo kunesu,
Ndiyani angatsanangure rudo\n rwaMwari.

3.
Mabvi ose pfugama , kutonga kutsvene,
Rudo rwenyu rukuru, mutsa waMwari,
(Rumbidzaa) Mabasa makuru,
(iJehova) Jehova mutsvene,
Ndiyani anganamatwe kunze kwenyuwo
Mwari.

1.
Jesus is the bread that feeds the\n nations
Jesus Christ is the way
(Is the way x3 bass)Thy word is a lamp
unto my feet And a light unto my path
For the bread is he which cometh down
from heaven above
And he gives life unto all the world
All the world (God so loved the)
All the world (world that He gave Jesus)
All the world (Christ) who believes will
be saved

2.
We are vessels which are consencrated
for the work of the Lord
(Of theLord x3 bass) To spread God\'s
word the lamp unto the feet
And the great light in the path
There\'s oneLord and one faith only one
source
And there is no candlestick nor church
lights on its self
On its self(The lord God Al)
On its self(Mighty and the)
On its self (Lamb of God) are the light
of the world

3.
Not by strength but by the spirit of God
Will this work be fulfilled
(Be fulfilled x3 bass) The word will be\n spread to all the nations That the Lord
God will be sight
Go ye therefore to all nations, kindred,
tongue and race
Preach the word of salvation to the\n world
To the world (Preach the word of)
To the world (salvation to)
To the world(the world)
Then the Lord God shall be sight

1.
Let them make me a sanctuary
That I may dwell among my people
In the likeness of that in heaven
Where Jesus Christ is standing as the\n High Priest

CHORUS
For unto two(thousand)(and) three\n hundred days
Shall the sanctuary be cleansed of all\n sins
Then the high priest, creator and\n redeemer
Shall enter the most holy place

2.
In the courtyard there was an alter
And the brazen lavar of water
Christ is the sacrifice for all sins
He\'ll sanctify with the word and the\n spirit

3.
In the Holy place was the table
Of the shew bread placed to the north\n side
And the lamp stand the alter of incense
Christ is the bread, the light let\'s raise\n our prayers

4.
The most holy place had the golden
Ark of covenant with the commandments
Pot of manna Aaron\'s rod that budded
Upholding righteousness, temperance\n and judgement

1.
I\'ve heard them sing he paid the price\n and Jesus bore it all
I\'ve heard them sing i\'m coming home\n and hear the Master\'s call
I\'ve heard them sing the modern songs\n and sings of long ago
But amazing grace how sweet the\n sound is the sweetest song i know

CHORUS
Amazing grace how sweet the sound
Oh how sweet is the sound
Sweeter song, sweeter song
In this life could be found
I\'ve heard a fount where sinners plunged\n washed as white
White as snow
But amazing grace how sweet the sound is the\n sweetest song i know

2.
I\'ve heard them sing he paid the price\n and just a little while
I\'ve heard them sing beyond the clouds\n and give the world a smile
I\'ve heard them sing there is a fount that\n washes white as snow
But amazing grace how sweet the sound is the\n sweetest song i know

3.
It was the song my mother sang in\n sweet and humble voice (sop)
Like music from the world above it\n made my soul rejoice(sop and alto)
Its soothing words and melody like\n rippling waters flow(sop, alto,turner)
But amazing grace how sweet the\n sound is the sweetest song i know

1.
I saw an angel come down from heaven\n above
Having great power His glory lightened\n the world
Mightily he cried with a strong voice\n saying
Babylon the great is fallen is fallen

CHORUS
The earth is lightened with His glory x2
A message of love from heaven to\n perishing world
Come out of her my people x2
Oh remnant rise and stand for the Lord

2.
It is the loud cry God\'s last call to the\n world
Second angel\'s message repeated and\n magnified
With corruptions which entered in the\n churches
All the false doctrines since 1844

3.
Some will choose Jesus the\n commandments they\'ll keep
Patiently waiting the faith of Jesus they\n have
A rich reward ,a robe and a golden\n crown
Jesus will give unto all His faithful\n friends

1.
Apo tofamba (Hummmmm),
Namuponesi(hummmm),
Toimbira(humm),
Tirimunzira(hummm),
Tofamba naye, (awoooo)
Tomutewera, (awooo)
Murwendo rwedu(awooo),
Toenda kumusha(awooo);

CHORUS
(Hakuna) Hakuna urombo,
(Hunoti) Hunotitambudza,
(Hakuna)Kana kupokana,
(Hakuna)Masodzi nekutya,
(Mitoro yedu) (ohhh) anotakura,
(Dakara tisvikeko kumusha) Tasvika
kumusha,
(Hakuna) kurwara nekufa,
(Hakuna) Kana nenhamozve,
(Toimba)Mbiri halleluya X2,
(Halelluya) Alleluya amen
(Allelu alleluya),
(Halleluya)Nekusingaperi.

1.
Fairest Lord Jesus ruler of all nations
Art thou of God andman the son
Thee will I cherish, theewill i honour
Thou art my glory, joy and crown

2.
Fair are all creeping things ,fairer still all\n mankind
Fairest the hands of Jesus Christ
Wounded to save us, bruised just to give\n us life
What love? By His stripes we are healed

3.
Fair are the seraphims, fairer still the\n cherubims
Fairest theHoly son of God
Thy throne\'s forever, a scepter of\n righteous
The scepter of thy kingdom

1.
Are you giving to the world a\n smile(sunny smile-
Helping lessen someone\'s dreary\n mile(dreary mile)
Do you greet theworld with song
As through life you pass along
Cheering those whom you may meet\n along life\'s way

CHORUS
Give the world yes a beautiful smile
Helping someone on life\'s dreary way
Paths of sin, bring them in
To his fold yes forever to stay
(Help to cheer the lone and sad)
Help cheer the sad, the lonely and sad
(Help to make some pilgrim glad)
Help make him gladmake somebody\n glad
(Let your) Life so be that all the world\n may see the joy of serving Jesus with\n a smile (Bright sunny smile)

2.
You may be a shinning light today
(yes today)
Pointing souls to heaven\'s glory way (glory way)
If you let your light so shine
That they see the path divine
And you wear a pleasant smile along life\'s way

1.
God is love, his mature his law is love
It ever has been it ever will be
God\'s charecter is love

CHORUS
The ten commandments are love
The first four show the love of God and\n man
And six live of you and me
Praise the Lord for His love

2.
Sin is not love, is transgression of God\'s\n law
T\'was sin which made Christ to hang on\n the cross
Jesus died for our sins

3.
Some thought to change the law of God\n which is love
I\'wld rather obey God thanmortal man
I delight in the law

4.
God\'s law will stand till hea\'vn and earth\n pass away
Not one jot will pass away from the law
Till all shall be fulfilled

1.
God is not man that He should lie
Nor son of man that He should repent
As he said and he\'ll not do
God is Lord, Lord of Lords

CHORUS
His promises are true(are true)
He\'ll surely fulfill(fulfill)
His love is true
He sent His only son(his son)
His coming is true
He\'ll surely return (return)
And judgement is true(is true)
Ohh who can escape(oh who can\n escape)

2.
God is not man his love is great
Stood to face death for sin bearing man
If we yield our lives to him
Power\'oer sin he\'ll provide

3.
Jesus has promises he\'ll return
And a reward to all men h\'ll give
Righteous judge eternal king
Will he find faith on earth

1.
Ngogqoka umqhele nxa ng\’fik ekhaya
Ngobona umsindisi nxa ng\’fik ekhaya
Ng;gqoke ezimhlophe
Ng\’hlabelel ingoma
Yenkos eyang\’hlenga ng\’fik ekhaya

CHORUS
Ngif\’k ekhaya
Ngif\’k ekhaya inhlupo zodlula
Nxa ngif\’k ekhaya
2.
Ndichapfeka chiremba kumushayo
Ndichatura mutoro kumushayo
Pfeke nguwo chena, ndichaimba rwiwo
Kwa Tenzi namambo kumushayo

CHORUS
Kumushayo , kumushayo , kumushayo
Hurombo huchapera kumushayo x2

3.
Umnyama wohlula nxa ngi\’fik ekhaya
Ngobon\’ukhukhanya nxa ngif\’ke ekhaya
Khanya kwezulwini, khanyasa ihlela
Khong\’ikhokhela nxa ngif\’kh ekhaya

CHORUS
Ngif\’k ekhaya
Ngif\’k ekhaya inhlupo zodlula
Nxa ngif\’k ekhaya x2

4.
Toona Muponesi kumushayo
Toimba nengirozi kumushayo
Kupenya kwedenga kwopangidza nzira
Kwonditungamira kumushayo

CHORUS
Kumushayo , kumushayo , kumushayo
Hurombo huchapera kumushayo x2

1.
There is no sermon there is no story
Ever preached lived ever told
Greater than the cross where Jesus
Laid His life for you and me

CHORUS
When i look at calvary\'s cross where
Jesus died i melt with wonder
All the glory of this world fades
As Christ\' s love reigns in my heart

2.
Wounded for all our transgressions
Bruised for our iniquities
The chastisement of our peace was
\'Pon Him by his stripes we are healed

3.
Greater love hath no man than this
That a man laid down his life
For his friends what wondrous love\n Christ
Is my song and salvation

(Jehova) Ndiye Tenzi mufudzi wangu (Idiko) Handina chiro chandinoshaya (Anondi) Radzika (pafuro) Pafuro (Raka) Pfawa (pfawi) sisaa

Ndotungamirwa pamvurayo yakaterama Jehova iye muchengeti Wemweya hunde mweya wandu Diko ndichafambamo mumikana Yemvuri werufu handichazombotyi

Tsvimbo yenyu neuyo mudonzvo (Yo (tsvimbo yenyu*2) (nemudonzvo*2) Zvinondingwarira (Zvinondingwarira zvese zvinondingwarira zvese) Jehova ndiye mufudzi wangu (Tenzi imi Jehova muri mufudzi wangu chose ndiri hwayi yenyu ini chokwadi)

(Magadzira tafura) Pamberi pangu ini mazora mafuta Mukombe wangu unorasira (Runako nadzo tsitsi) Zvose ipfuma yangu zvichanditewera mazuva angu esee

(Diko ndichagara) Ndichagara munedengaro dzvene dengaro musha mutsvene (Ndichagara munedenga dzvene denga musha wangu mitsvene)

Ndichagara, denga dzvene, pemberera, svika denga (Ndicha ndichagara munedenga dzvene ndicha zopembera ndasvika kudenga) Nengirozi dziriyoo , mazambara ariyo (Nengirozi , mazambara) (Ngirozi dziriyo nawo mazambara) Ndichazoimba ndwiyo ndasvika denga dzvene (Imba ndwiyo, svika denga) (Ndichaimba ndwiyo ndasvika kudenga) Pano handiwo musha ndichazosvika denga (Handimusha, svika denga) (Pano handimusha, ndichasvika) Uko kunerugare.

1.
Last night when I was lonely I looked at the sky,
The starts looked like notes in the air,
Like a mighty piece of music penned by God\’s own hand,
Written for a choir way up there.

CHORUS
I heard the angels sing glory alleluia,
A mighty chorus way up high,
I heard the angels sing praise the name of Jesus,
Singing in God\’s choir in the sky,
I heard a thousand trumpets sounding out his glory,
Telling the story how he came to earth to die,
I heard a million voices praise the name of Jesus,
Singing in God\’s choir in the sky.

2.
I heard a glorious song coming out of heaven,
The sweetest music ever heard,
I heard a mighty song sung by all the angels,
My soul thrilled at every loving word.


3.
I fell down on my knees when the chorus ended,
They shouted out a glad Amen,
I fell down on my kneels. Praise that when in heaven,
I\’d hear that choir once again.

1.
Lord in us awake,
A revival yes,
Of premitive Godliness,
Lord how much we long,
For those paths of old,
That religion old and pure.

2.
Lord in us awake,
That old fashioned faith,
Faith like Abraham\'s,
Strong and true,
Lord in us awake,
That old faithfulness,
Returning tithes faithfully.

3.
May we live each day,
In faith alone,
Ever trusting in you Lord,
For our bread and strength,
For our salvation,
As we lift our hearts in praise.

1.
Semazuva’yo aNoah,
Vanhu vofara muchivi,
Mvura zhinji yakauya,
Vashoma vakaponeswa.

CHORUS
M’bairo wezvivi rufu,
Chipo chaMwari upenyu,
soko raShe ndiwo mwenje,
Muka mwenje itungidzwe.

2.
Zvivi ndiko kudarika,
Murairo waJehova,
Jesu akakunda chivi,
Nesu tokunda maari.

3.
Hatinyari n\’Evhangeri,
Muchinjiko wosimbisa,
Muvambi nemukwanisi,
Wekutanda kwedu ndiShe.

4.
Mutemo waMwari rudo,
Joko rake roreruka,
Tisaputse murairo,
Tobatira pakutenda.

1.
The greatest want of the world is the want,
Of men, men who will not be bought or sold,
Men who in their inmost souls are true and honest,
Men who do not fear to call sin by its right name,
Men whose conscience is as true,
To duty as the needle to the pole,
Men who will stand for the right,
Stand for the right though the heavens fall.

CHORUS
Here ohh Lord i stand for thee,
I submit my will to your own,
As the clay in the potter\'s hands,
Mold me shape me Lord.

2.
All angels long to look into these things,
When fallen men stands perfect, holy, pure,
The law of God reflected in each person\'s heart,
With no trace of sin but its Jesus in yhe heart,
Jesus Christ is coming soon,
With all the angels what a glorious day,
With each charecter as true,
A perfect nation eternal be.

1.
If we knew the price of a single soul,
Not worth a mansion, silver\’o gold,
But worth the blood and life of God,
We’ll rise and go to spread the Word.

CHORUS
It might be day of night we\’ll work,
Even the valley\’o hills we\’ll tread,
Here we are Lord send us today,
Between the plough and alter we stand!

2.
When the way gets dark, the lamp is thy word,
Christ is the vine and we the branch,
Ev\’n in the tempest we will shout,
\‘The love of Christ constraineth us!\’

3.
What a solemn call to the world we have,
Three angels\’ message to proclaim,
The righteousness of Christ our Lord,
It’s Christ within, hope of glory.

4.
And though some through death in the graves will rest,
Hope is in Jesus\’ coming back,
The graves will open and we\’ll see,
The souls redeemed from sin and death.

Magnify, glory, ex-tol and ex-alt the Lord,
Magnify, glory His holy name forever more,
Magnify, glorify, extol and exalt the Lord, exalt
and glorify, magnify His name forever more.

Our feet shall stand within thy gates O Jerusalem!
We will re-joice, we will re-joice, re-joice in thy salvation,
Our feet(shall stand) shall stand with-in thy gates,
O Jerusalem! Shall stand within thy gates, Jerusalem!

Magnify, glorify, extol and exalt the Lord,
Magnify, glorify, His holy name forever more,
Magnify glorify extol and exalt the Lord, exalt and glorify,
Magnify His name forever more.

Extol Him that rideth upon the heav\’ns, by His name, God,
Extol Him that rideth upon the heav\’ns, by His name, God,
and rejoice, and rejoice before Him, and rejoice before Him,
and rejoice before Him,

We will rejoice in Thy salvation,
and in Thy name we will lift up our banners,
and come again with singing unto Zion,
and obtain gladness and joy.
Magnify, glorify, extol and exalt the Lord,
Magnify, glorify His Holy name forever more,
Magnify, glorify, extol and exalt the Lord,
Glorify, magnify His name forever more.

Halelujah! Amen, Halelujah! Amen,
Halelujah, Halelujah, Amen.
